= Other Packages =
To add other packages in Anki, follow the following steps:

1. *Open* Anki
2. Hit *_CTRL+SHIFT+N_* to go to manage note types
3. Click *"Options..."*
4. Add packages to the *preamble*

{{{LaTeX
\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\special{papersize=3in,5in}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amssymb,amsmath,soul}
\pagestyle{empty}
\setlength{\parindent}{0in}
\begin{document}
}}}
